response.overview: In Korea, where rumors are rampant that the end of the world is coming. The story is spreading that those who believe will ascend to heaven and those who do not will remain on this earth and experience tribulation. Leon wants to go on a date with his boyfriend, Hanrok. But the two have no money. Then one day, Leon's parents accidentally end up with a lot of money, and Leon steals the money, runs away from home, and goes on a trip around the country with Hanrok. However, during the trip, Leon notices Hanrok acting strangely every night, and realizes that his trip has another purpose.
response.title: Runway
